meanings.definition: Form a mental image or concept of something.
meanings.sent1: Close your eyes and imagine a big, red apple.
meanings.sent2: I often imagine myself flying through the sky like a bird.
meanings.sent3: Can you imagine a world where everyone can talk to animals?
meanings.sent4: She could imagine the colors of the rainbow dancing in the sky.
meanings.sent5: Try to imagine the sound of waves crashing on the shore.

meanings.definition: Believe in the possibility of something.
meanings.sent1: I imagine we will have a picnic if the weather is nice.
meanings.sent2: Do you imagine we will see shooting stars tonight?
meanings.sent3: I can imagine a unicorn appearing in the garden tomorrow!
meanings.sent4: She imagined winning the lottery and buying a big house.
meanings.sent5: Imagine finding a treasure chest buried in your backyard!

meanings.sent1: I imagine he will arrive at the party late.
meanings.sent2: Can you imagine how fast a cheetah can run?
meanings.sent3: Imagine you are a detective solving a mysterious case.
meanings.sent4: She imagined what it would be like to live on Mars.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the taste of your favorite ice cream melting on your tongue.
